name: OscarAwardFacts
0:
”Alexa, open oscar award facts.”
”Alexa, tell oscar award facts to give me a fact.”
”tell me a oscar award fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oscar award facts
des: Oscar Award Facts has many different amazing facts which most people are unaware of. Facts are randomized. So, each time whenever asked, Alexa will reply with a completely different fact. User can start this skill by saying, " Alexa, open oscar award facts".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
